items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
items.title: admin-remix/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: AION DeepSeekCoder is a lightweight VS Code extension that connects to DeepSeek Coder V3 via OpenRouter, enabling users to chat with a powerful AI model directly inside the editor. Ideal for developers who want contextual coding help, analysis, and refactoring assistance using DeepSeek’s LLM.

Ideal for developers who want contextual coding help, analysis, and refactoring assistance using DeepSeek’s LLM.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: DotWriter is a lightweight Chrome extension that brings AI-assisted writing directly to your browser. Simply type -- in any text field—emails, documents, chats—and DotWriter instantly offers intelligent suggestions to help you write faster and better. Designed for professionals, creators, and anyone who types on the web. Built with privacy and perf
